DOC.brief_title: Cinacalcet Secondary Hyperparathyroidism Patients Receiving Hemodialysis
DOC.criteria: Age old 18 yr On hemodialysis least 3 month ( thrice weekly ) iPTH > 300pg/ml histological evidence secondary hyperparathyroidism Calcium > 8.1 mg/dl Unstable clinical condition
